.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WorkbookBase extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.EntryPoint, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.IWorkbookExtension, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.ICachedDataPersistanceCallback, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.IExtension, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, class System.IDisposable, class System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent

summary.span: 提供 Microsoft Office Excel 的文档级项目中的 ThisWorkbook 类的基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for the ThisWorkbook class in document-level projects for Microsoft Office Excel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是适用于基`ThisWorkbook`通过使用 Visual Studio 创建的文档级 Excel 项目中的类。The class is the base class for the `ThisWorkbook` class in document-level Excel projects created by using Visual Studio. 使用`ThisWorkbook`类以编程方式访问你的项目中的工作簿。Use the `ThisWorkbook` class to programmatically access the workbook in your project. 有关详细信息，请参阅[文档级自定义项编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md)。For more information, see [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md). 类提供相同的成员Excel 主互操作程序集，但前者的对象将添加以下功能：The class provides the same members as the object in the Excel primary interop assembly, but it adds the following features: - 属性。 property. 使用此属性添加到工作簿的智能标记。Use this property to add smart tags to a workbook. - 属性。 property. 使用此属性来获取基础工作簿主机项的对象。Use this property to get the underlying object for a workbook host item. - 方法。 method. 使用此方法从文档级自定义项中的工作簿中删除 Office 自定义程序集。Use this method to remove the Office customization assembly from the workbook in a document-level customization. - 方法。 method. 重写此方法，如果你添加到你的项目通过使用多个自定义功能区**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 项模板，并且想要指定运行时在显示的功能区。Override this method if you added multiple custom Ribbons to your project by using the **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item template, and you want to specify which Ribbons to display at run time. - 方法。 method. 重写此方法，以公开您的项目与工作簿中的 VBA 代码中的类。Override this method to expose a class in your project to VBA code in the workbook. ## 创建工作簿主机项Creating Workbook Host Items 无法创建以编程方式在 Office 项目中的对象。You cannot create objects programmatically in Office projects. 在文档级项目中，`ThisWorkbook`类 (它派生自) 自动实例化[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]当最终用户打开工作簿。In document-level projects, the `ThisWorkbook` class (which derives from ) is instantiated automatically by the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] when the end user opens the workbook. 有关详细信息，请参阅[文档级自定义项编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md)。For more information, see [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md). 在应用程序级项目中，你可以创建工作簿主机项以编程方式使用`GetVstoObject`方法。In application-level projects, you can create workbook host items programmatically by using the `GetVstoObject` method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展 Word 文档和 Excel VSTO 外接程序在运行时中的工作簿](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md)。For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md). ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net4utilities](~/includes/vsto-net4utilities-md.md)] ## Examples [主机项和主机控件概述Host Items and Host Controls Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/host-items-and-host-controls-overview.md) [工作簿主机项Workbook Host Item](/visualstudio/vsto/workbook-host-item.md)

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).

summary.span: 指定特定工作表函数是否使用最新精度算法来计算其结果。

span.span: Specifies whether certain worksheet functions use the latest accuracy algorithms to calculate their results.

value.span: 一个指定特定工作表函数是否使用最新精度算法来计算其结果的值。

span.span: A value that specifies whether certain worksheet functions use the latest accuracy algorithms to calculate their results.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，工作表函数，从 Excel 2007 及更早版本的 Excel 使用新的算法，可提高其准确性。By default, some of the worksheet functions from Excel 2007 and earlier versions of Excel use new algorithms that increase their accuracy. 但是，在某些情况下，新的算法会降低这些函数相对于 Excel 2007 中其性能的性能和早期版本的 Excel。However, in some cases, the new algorithms decrease the performance of these functions relative to their performance in Excel 2007 and earlier versions of Excel. 若要指定这些工作表函数使用旧算法以提高其性能，设置属性设置为 1。To specify that these worksheet functions use the older algorithms to increase their performance, set the property to 1. 下表描述的可能设置属性。The following table describes the possible settings for the property. |设置Setting|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |00|使用最新、 最准确地算法 （默认值）Use the latest, most accurate algorithms (default)| |11|使用 Excel 2007 或更早版本算法Use Excel 2007 or earlier version algorithms| |22|使用 Excel 2010 算法Use Excel 2010 algorithms| > [!NOTE] > 设置为 0、 1 或 2 以外的值的属性将导致未定义的行为。Setting the property to a value other than 0, 1, or 2 will result in undefined behavior. 下表总结了哪些功能受设置属性设置为 1。The following table summarizes which functions are affected by setting the property to 1. "函数不影响"列中列出的函数将始终使用最新的准确性算法或 Excel 2010 中未更改。The functions that are listed in the "Functions not affected" column will always use the latest accuracy algorithms or were not changed in Excel 2010. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Activate() cil managed

summary.span: 激活工作簿的第一个关联窗口。

span.span: Activates the first window associated with the workbook.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这不会运行可能会附加到工作簿任何 Auto_Activate 或 Auto_Deactivate 宏 (使用方法来运行这些宏)。This does not run any Auto_Activate or Auto_Deactivate macros that might be attached to the workbook (use the method to run those macros).

summary.span: 在激活工作簿时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the workbook is activated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你显示相同的工作簿的两个窗口之间切换事件发生，但工作簿的事件不会发生。When you switch between two windows showing the same workbook, the event occurs, but the event for the workbook does not occur. 创建一个新窗口时，此事件不会发生。This event does not occur when you create a new window. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates a handler for the event. 事件处理程序会显示工作表`Sheet1`时激活该工作簿。The event handler displays worksheet `Sheet1` when the workbook is activated. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. summary.span: 在 Microsoft Office Excel 保存工作簿的数据或将数据从工作簿导出到 XML 数据文件后发生。

span.span: Occurs after Microsoft Office Excel saves or exports data from the workbook to an XML data file.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从工作簿中导出 XML 数据。The following code example demonstrates how to export XML data from a workbook. 此示例导入 XML 数据从到当前工作簿中。The example imports the XML data from a into a in the current workbook. 该示例然后调用方法将数据从导出到 XML 文件。The example then calls the method to export the data from the into an XML file. 当调用方法时，事件处理程序会报告，正在导出的 XML，和事件处理程序会报告是否已成功导出 XML。When the method is called, the event handler reports that the XML is being exported, and the event handler reports whether the XML was successfully exported. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWorkBook#203](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWorkBook/CS/ThisWorkbook.cs#203)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWorkBook#203](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWorkBook/VB/ThisWorkbook.vb#203)]

summary.span: 在刷新现有 XML 数据连接后或将新 XML 数据导入工作簿后发生。

span.span: Occurs after an existing XML data connection is refreshed or after new XML data is imported into the workbook.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 XML 数据导入工作簿。The following code example demonstrates how to import XML data into a workbook. 该示例创建客户的名称，并将添加基于的 XML 架构到当前工作簿的集合。The example creates a of customer names and adds an based on the XML schema for the to the collection of the current workbook. 该示例然后调用方法将数据导入到工作表`Sheet1`。The example then calls the method to import the data into worksheet `Sheet1`. 当调用方法时，事件处理程序会提示用户继续还是取消导入 XML 中，与事件处理程序会报告是否已成功导入了 XML。When the method is called, the event handler prompts the user to either proceed with or cancel importing the XML, and the event handler reports whether the XML was successfully imported. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates a handler for the event. 事件处理程序会提示用户进行保存更改，不保存更改，或取消关闭操作，如果自上次保存后对工作簿进行更改。The event handler prompts the user to either save changes, not save changes, or cancel the close operation if changes have been made to the workbook since it was last saved. 如果用户不保存更改，则工作簿的属性设置为`true`，以便 Microsoft Office Excel 不会提示用户保存工作簿时，继续执行关闭操作。If the user does not save changes, then the property of the workbook is set to `true` so that Microsoft Office Excel does not prompt the user to save the workbook when the close operation continues. 如果用户取消关闭操作，则`Cancel`参数事件处理程序设置为`true`，以便 Microsoft Office Excel 不会关闭工作簿。If the user cancels the close operation, then the `Cancel` parameter of the event handler is set to `true` so that Microsoft Office Excel does not close the workbook. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回整个集合的内置文档属性。This property returns the entire collection of built-in document properties. 使用`Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties.Item(System.Object)`属性以返回集合的单个成员 (`Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties`对象) 通过指定名称的属性或集合索引 （以数字）。Use the `Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties.Item(System.Object)` property to return a single member of the collection (a `Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties` object) by specifying either the name of the property or the collection index (as a number). 您可以参考文档属性，按索引值或名称。You can refer to document properties either by index value or by name. 以下列表显示可用的内置文档属性名称：The following list shows the available built-in document property names: - 标题Title - SubjectSubject - 作者Author - 关键字Keywords - 注释Comments - 模板Template - 最后一个作者Last Author - 修订号Revision Number - Application NameApplication Name - 上一次打印日期Last Print Date - 创建日期Creation Date - 上次保存时间Last Save Time - 编辑时间总计Total Editing Time - 页面数Number of Pages - 字的数目Number of Words - 字符数Number of Characters - 安全性Security - 类别Category - 格式Format - ManagerManager - 公司Company - 字节数Number of Bytes - 行数Number of Lines - 段落数Number of Paragraphs - 幻灯片数Number of Slides - 说明的数Number of Notes - 隐藏幻灯片数Number of Hidden Slides - 多媒体剪辑数Number of Multimedia Clips - 超链接基础Hyperlink Base - （带空格） 的字符数Number of Characters (with spaces) 容器应用程序不需要定义每个内置文档属性的值。Container applications are not required to define values for every built-in document property. 如果 Microsoft Office Excel 未定义的一个内置文档属性的值，读取`Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties.Value`该文档属性的属性将引发异常。If Microsoft Office Excel does not define a value for one of the built-in document properties, reading the `Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties.Value` property for that document property throws an exception. 使用属性返回的自定义文档属性的集合。Use the property to return the collection of custom document properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性列 A 中工作表中显示的所有内置文档属性的当前工作簿`Sheet1`。The following code example uses the property to display all of the built-in document properties of the current workbook in column A of worksheet `Sheet1`. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可使用以下参数。The property can be used with the following parameter. |参数Parameter|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Index`|索引数 （从 1 至 56) 工作簿调色板中的颜色。The index number of a color in the workbook color palette (from 1 to 56). 如果未指定此参数，此属性将返回包含所有 56 种颜色调色板中的数组。If this argument is not specified, this property returns an array that contains all 56 of the colors in the palette.| 如果你尝试使用而不指定任何参数，将获取对象属于的 Office 开发工具在 Visual Studio 基础结构和不应在代码中直接使用。If you attempt to use without specifying any parameters, will get a object that is part of the Office development tools in Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 工作簿调色板中的 56 条目，每个表示 RGB 值。The workbook palette has 56 entries, each represented by an RGB value. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性可以在工作簿的调色板为蓝色，请设置的第一个颜色，然后以编程方式显示 Microsoft Office Excel**调色板**对话框来验证是否此进行更改。The following code example uses the property to set the first color in the workbook's color palette to blue, and then programmatically displays the Microsoft Office Excel **Color Palette** dialog to verify that this change was made. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当工作簿是嵌入其他应用程序中并由用户激活通过双击该工作簿时，使用通过工作簿对象的属性返回的一套 Excel 命令栏中其他应用程序可用。When a workbook is embedded in another application and activated by the user by double-clicking the workbook, using the property with a Workbook object returns the set of Excel command bars available within the other application. 在所有其他情况下，使用此属性的工作簿对象返回`null`。At all other times, using this property with a Workbook object returns `null`. 没有返回附加到工作簿的命令栏组无法通过编程方式。There is no programmatic way to return the set of command bars attached to a workbook. 命令条是与应用程序和不是工作簿相关联。Command bars are associated with the application and not the workbook. 此属性存在于工作簿上，因此 Excel 不为应用程序时，你可以访问 Excel 应用程序命令栏。This property exists on the workbook so you can access Excel application command bars when Excel is not the application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性以删除所有不可见的自定义命令栏。The following code example uses the property to delete all custom command bars that are not visible. 此示例假定，当前工作簿嵌入在另一个应用程序。This example assumes that the current workbook is embedded in another application. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 Excel 失败，系统会出现故障，或如果系统不正确关闭的情况下 （不允许 Excel 不能保存更改的文件），打开备份的文件，并且用户有机会保存更改，否则可能已丢失。If Excel fails, the system fails, or if the system is improperly shut down (not allowing Excel to save the changed files), the backed up files are opened and the user has an opportunity to save changes that otherwise would have been lost. 当用户重启 Excel 时，将打开文档恢复窗口，向用户提供恢复他们正在处理的文件的选项。When the user restarts Excel, a document recovery window opens, giving the user an option to recover the files they were working on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用图标集以将范围数据划分到隔开阈值的三到五个类别。You can use an icon set to classify range data into three to five categories separated by threshold values. 每个图标表示一系列的值。Each icon represents a range of values. 例如，在`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlIconSet.xl3Arrows`图标集，红色向上箭头代表较高值、 黄色侧向箭头代表中间值，和绿色向下箭头表示较低的值。For example, in the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlIconSet.xl3Arrows` icon set, the red up arrow represents higher values, the yellow sideways arrow represents middle values, and the green down arrow represents lower values. 若要应用基于图标集条件格式设置规则，创建一个新`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSetCondition`使用`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.FormatConditions.AddIconSetCondition`方法属性的范围，或的命名范围的属性。To apply a conditional formatting rule based on an icon set, create a new `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSetCondition` by using the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.FormatConditions.AddIconSetCondition` method of the property of a range, or the property of a named range. 然后，设置`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSetCondition.IconSet`属性`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSet`从检索的对象属性。Then, set the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSetCondition.IconSet` property to an `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSet` object that you retrieve from the property. 若要指定`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSet`你想要检索，则之一传递的对象`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlIconSet`枚举值的索引属性。To specify the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.IconSet` object that you want to retrieve, pass in one of the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlIconSet` enumeration values as an index to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在填充范围`Sheet1`的值为从 1 到 6。The following code example populates a range on `Sheet1` with values from 1 to 6. 然后该示例添加一个图标将条件设置为范围 a1: a6 与`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlIconSet.xl3Arrows`图标集。The example then adds an icon set condition to the range A1:A6 with the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlIconSet.xl3Arrows` icon set. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置此属性为`true`，该工作簿具有以下特征：When you set this property to `true`, the workbook has the following characteristics: - 你不会提示保存工作簿，如果工作簿处于打开状态时进行更改。You are not prompted to save the workbook if changes are made while the workbook is open. - 工作簿窗口不可见。The workbook window is not visible. - 工作簿中的所有宏都都不显示在**宏**对话框 (通过指向显示**宏**上**工具**菜单，然后单击**宏**).Any macros in the workbook are not visible in the **Macro** dialog box (displayed by pointing to **Macro** on the **Tools** menu and clicking **Macros**). - 工作簿中的宏仍可运行从**宏**对话框中，即使它们是不可见。Macros in the workbook can still be run from the **Macro** dialog box even though they are not visible. 此外，宏名称不必是与工作薄名称限定的。In addition, macro names do not need to be qualified with the workbook name. - 按住 SHIFT 键，当您打开工作簿时无任何影响。Holding down the SHIFT key when you open the workbook has no effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在返回的名称是链接的文档、 版本，或 DDE 或 OLE 服务器的名称。The names in the returned are the names of the linked documents, editions, or DDE or OLE servers. 该数组的格式是一维数组的所有类型，但发布服务器和订阅服务器。The format of the array is a one-dimensional array for all types but publisher and subscriber. 返回的字符串包含的链接类型的相应表示法中的链接源的名称。The returned strings contain the name of the link source, in the appropriate notation for the link type. 例如，DDE 链接使用"服务器 | 文档 ！项"语法。For example, DDE links use the "Server|Document!Item" syntax. 有关发布服务器和订阅服务器的链接，则返回的数组是二维。For publisher and subscriber links, the returned array is two-dimensional. 数组的第一列包含的版本，名称和第二列包含的各个版本的引用为文本。The first column of the array contains the names of the edition, and the second column contains the references of the editions as text. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将外部 Excel 链接添加到当前工作簿和工作簿中获取的 Excel 的所有链接的名称的数组，通过使用方法。The following code example adds an external Excel link to the current workbook and gets an array of the names of all Excel links in the workbook by using the method. 然后该示例使用方法打开每个链接的工作簿为只读。The example then uses the method to open each linked workbook as read-only. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用强密码合并大写和小写字母、 数字和符号。Use strong passwords that combine uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols. 弱密码不同时包含这些元素。Weak passwords do not mix these elements. 强密码： Y6dh ！ et5。Strong password: Y6dh!et5. 弱密码： House27。Weak password: House27. 使用你自己可以记住，以便无需将其记下的强密码。Use a strong password that you can remember so that you do not have to write it down. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查的值属性来确定工作簿是否受密码保护。The following code example checks the value of the property to determine whether the workbook is password protected. 如果工作簿不受密码保护，然后该示例设置的密码的属性获取用户输入，然后调用方法来设置加密算法、 设置的密钥长度、 设定的加密提供程序的名称并启用文件属性加密。If the workbook is not password protected, then the example sets the property to a password obtained from user input, and then calls the method to set the encryption algorithm, set the key length, set the name of the encryption provider, and enable file property encryption. 然后，该示例显示的值， ， ，和工作表中的属性`Sheet1`。The example then displays the values of the , , , and properties in worksheet `Sheet1`. 此示例假定方法`GetPasswordFromUserInput`其他位置定义。This example assumes that the method `GetPasswordFromUserInput` is defined elsewhere. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用强密码合并大写和小写字母、 数字和符号。Use strong passwords that combine uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols. 弱密码不同时包含这些元素。Weak passwords do not mix these elements. 例如，"Y6dh ！ et5"是一个强密码，但"House27"是弱密码。For example, "Y6dh!et5" is a strong password, but "House27" is a weak password. 使用你自己可以记住，以便无需将其记下的强密码。Use a strong password that you can remember so that you do not have to write it down. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来保护工作簿和工作簿 windows，但不会指定密码保护的结构。The following code example uses the method to protect the structure of the workbook and workbook windows, but without specifying password protection. 该示例然后检查的值和属性，以验证设置此保护。The example then checks the values of the and properties to verify that this protection is set. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. summary.span: 由 [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] 调用，以便可在保存缓存数据后，重新对工作簿应用密码保护。

span.span: Called by the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] so that you can reapply password protection to the workbook after the cached data has been saved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你的工作簿受密码保护，而且它包含的缓存的数据，可能在运行时更改 Excel 重写此方法在文档级项目中。Override this method in a document-level project for Excel if your workbook is protected by using a password, and it contains cached data that might be changed at run time. 在你实现此方法中，使用方法来保护工作簿。In your implementation of this method, use the method to protect the workbook. 默认情况下，对受密码保护的工作簿中的缓存数据的更改不会保留在保存工作簿时。By default, changes to cached data in a password-protected workbook are not persisted when the workbook is saved. 若要将更改保存到缓存的数据，必须在你的项目中重写以下方法：To save changes to the cached data, you must override the following methods in your project: - 。. 保存工作簿后，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用此方法。When the workbook is saved, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls this method. 将代码添加到此方法的暂时取消保护该工作簿。Add code to this method that temporarily unprotects the workbook. 这使对缓存的数据要保存更改。This enables changes to the cached data to be saved. - 。. 保存工作簿后，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用此方法。After the workbook is saved, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls this method. 将代码添加到此方法的重新应用到的工作簿的保护。Add code to this method that reapplies protection to the workbook. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Password-Protected 文档中缓存数据](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-cache-data-in-a-password-protected-document.md)。For more information, see [How to: Cache Data in a Password-Protected Document](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-cache-data-in-a-password-protected-document.md). [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用方法，即使由于无关密码保护某些错误，无法保存缓存的数据。The [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls the method even if the cached data could not be saved because of some error that is unrelated to the password protection. 例如，如果你实现接口可自定义缓存的数据的方式存储在文档中，调用方法即使你实现引发了异常，防止保存缓存的数据。For example, if you implement the interface to customize how cached data is stored in the document, the method is called even if your implementation throws an exception that prevents the cached data from being saved. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法以重新应用已通过重写中删除的保护方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to reapply protection that was removed by overriding the method. 若要使用此代码，可以从运行`ThisWorkbook`Excel 的文档级项目中的类。To use this code, run it from the `ThisWorkbook` class in a document-level project for Excel. 该代码假定该密码存储在名为的字段中`securelyStoredPassword`。The code assumes that the password is stored in a field named `securelyStoredPassword`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以通过执行以下任务来删除自定义项：This method removes the customization by performing the following tasks: - 它将删除`_AssemblyName`和`_AssemblyLocation`从工作簿的自定义属性。It deletes the `_AssemblyName` and `_AssemblyLocation` custom properties from the workbook. 有关详细信息，请参阅[自定义文档属性概述](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-document-properties-overview.md)。For more information, see [Custom Document Properties Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-document-properties-overview.md). - 它从工作簿中删除缓存的数据。It deletes the cached data from the workbook. 有关缓存数据的详细信息，请参阅[缓存数据](/visualstudio/vsto/caching-data.md)。For more information about cached data, see [Caching Data](/visualstudio/vsto/caching-data.md). 此方法可能引发如果工作簿受到保护。This method might throw an if the workbook is protected. 调用此方法之前，应从工作簿删除任何保护。You should remove any protection from the workbook before calling this method.

Designer](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-designer.md). 如果你重写此方法，请检查的值`serviceGuid`参数，以确定是否`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility`接口正在请求、，然后返回实现该接口的对象。If you override this method, check the value of the `serviceGuid` parameter to determine whether the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` interface is being requested, and then return an object that implements the interface. 当打开你的工作簿时，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用，然后它将返回的值发送到 Microsoft Office Excel。When your workbook is opened, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls , and it sends the return value to Microsoft Office Excel. 有关详细信息`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility`接口，请参阅[IRibbonExtensibility 对象](HV10096517)Microsoft Office 文档中。For more information about the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` interface, see [IRibbonExtensibility Object](HV10096517) in the Microsoft Office documentation. 或者可以重写方法而非重写方法。You can alternatively override the method instead of overriding the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区 XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml.md)。For more information, see [Ribbon XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml.md). > [!NOTE] > `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` 是多个接口 (也名为*扩展性接口*) 提供的 Microsoft Office。`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` is one of several interfaces (also named *extensibility interfaces*) that are provided by Microsoft Office. 但是，这是可以在 Excel 的文档级自定义项中实现的唯一接口。However, this is the only interface that you can implement in a document-level customization for Excel. 在应用程序级外接程序，可以实现其他扩展性接口。有关详细信息，请参阅[UI 功能通过使用扩展性接口自定义](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces.md)。You can implement other extensibility interfaces in application-level add-ins. For more information, see [Customizing UI Features By Using Extensibility Interfaces](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将其发布到 Excel Services 工作簿中，此属性返回的项的集合。This property returns a collection of the items in the workbook that you can publish to Excel Services. 在服务器上，将显示仅在此集合中的对象。Only objects in this collection will be shown on the server. 默认情况下，显示整个工作簿 （包括所有工作表）。By default, the entire workbook (including all worksheets) is shown. 只有一个对象可以存在每个工作簿。Only one object can exist per workbook. 此集合不能按名称，索引，因为没有被标记为可查看服务器上的对象的名称是唯一不能保证。This collection cannot be indexed by name, because there is no guarantee that the names of objects that are marked as viewable on the server are unique. 在 Excel 用户界面中，你可以查看的对象被标记为可在服务器上查看的集合**Excel Services 选项**对话框。In the Excel user interface, you can view the collection of objects that are marked as viewable on the server in the **Excel Services Options** dialog box.

span.span: Sets the options for encrypting the workbook using a password.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `PasswordEncryptionProvider`， `PasswordEncryptionAlgorithm`，和`PasswordEncryptionKeyLength`参数不是相互独立。The `PasswordEncryptionProvider`, `PasswordEncryptionAlgorithm`, and `PasswordEncryptionKeyLength` parameters are not independent of each other. 所选的加密提供程序限制算法和密钥长度，可以选择的组。A selected encryption provider limits the set of algorithms and key length that can be chosen. 有关`PasswordEncryptionKeyLength`有参数是没有固有的密钥长度范围上限。For the `PasswordEncryptionKeyLength` parameter there is no inherent limit on the range of the key length. 它还确定加密算法加密服务提供程序由确定范围。The range is determined by the Cryptographic Service Provider which also determines the cryptographic algorithm. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查的值属性来确定工作簿是否受密码保护。The following code example checks the value of the property to determine whether the workbook is password protected. 如果工作簿不受密码保护，然后该示例设置的密码的属性获取用户输入，然后调用方法来设置加密算法、 设置的密钥长度、 设定的加密提供程序的名称并启用文件属性加密。If the workbook is not password protected, then the example sets the property to a password obtained from user input, and then calls the method to set the encryption algorithm, set the key length, set the name of the encryption provider, and enable file property encryption. 然后，该示例显示的值， ， ，和工作表中的属性`Sheet1`。The example then displays the values of the , , , and properties in worksheet `Sheet1`. 此示例假定方法`GetPasswordFromUserInput`其他位置定义。This example assumes that the method `GetPasswordFromUserInput` is defined elsewhere. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件不会在编辑或重新计算单元格以外的任何情况下发生。The event does not occur under any conditions other than editing or recalculating cells. 例如，它时不会出现数据透视表是刷新、 排序、 筛选，或向下钻取，即使这些操作移动单元格，并可能从 OLAP 数据源中检索新值。For example, it will not occur when the PivotTable is refreshed, sorted, filtered, or drilled down on, even though those operations move cells and potentially retrieve new values from the OLAP data source. > [!NOTE] > 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

exception.span: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

span.span: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.

summary.span: 在将更改应用于数据透视表之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before changes are applied to a PivotTable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Excel 立即执行 UPDATE CUBE 语句以将所有更改都应用到数据透视表的 OLAP 数据源之前, 和用户已选择的用户界面以都应用更改后立即时发生事件。The event occurs immediately before Excel executes an UPDATE CUBE statement to apply all changes to the PivotTable's OLAP data source, and immediately after the user has chosen to apply changes in the user interface. > [!NOTE] > 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Excel 立即执行针对数据透视表的 OLAP 数据源，提交事务之前，用户已选择为整个数据透视表中保存更改后立即发生的事件。The event occurs immediately before Excel executes a COMMIT TRANSACTION against the PivotTable's OLAP data source, and immediately after the user has chosen to save changes for the whole PivotTable. > [!NOTE] > 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

summary.span: 在放弃对数据透视表的更改之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before changes to a PivotTable are discarded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Excel 执行针对 OLAP 数据源，ROLLBACK TRANSACTION 语句，如果在事务仍处于活动状态，且然后用户已选择放弃所做的更改之后将丢弃所有数据透视表中, 编辑过的值之前，将发生此事件。This event occurs immediately before Excel executes a ROLLBACK TRANSACTION statement against the OLAP data source, if a transaction is still active, and then discards all edited values in the PivotTable, after the user has chosen to discard changes. > [!NOTE] > 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

span.span: Occurs when the workbook host item shuts down.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是要在中调用的最后一个事件类作为类卸载。This is the last event to be called in the class as the class unloads. 此事件用于任何其他清理过程。Use this event for any additional clean up. 文档级自定义项，当工作簿主机项关闭时，将卸载程序集的应用程序域。In a document-level customization, the application domain for the assembly unloads when the workbook host item shuts down. 在应用程序级外接程序，工作簿主机项关闭时，不会不卸载应用程序域。In an application-level add-in, the application domain does not unload when the workbook host item shuts down. 此外，基础的工作簿对象将不再可用。Also, the underlying workbook object is no more available. 若要访问工作簿，关闭使用之前相反。To access the workbook before it shuts down use instead. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates a handler for the event. 事件处理程序会显示一条消息时类卸载。The event handler displays a message when the class unloads. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. CryptoAPI 被安装 Microsoft Internet 资源管理器 4.01 或更高版本。The CryptoAPI is installed with Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.01 or later. 你可以从证书颁发机构获取数字签名证书。You can obtain a digital signature certificate from a certification authority. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取签名附加到当前工作簿并向用户显示相应的消息数。The following code example gets the number of signatures that are attached to the current workbook and displays an appropriate message to the user. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你忘记了密码，则无法取消该工作簿。If you forget the password, you cannot unprotect the workbook. 最好将密码及其对应文档名的列表保存在安全的位置。It is a good idea to keep a list of your passwords and their corresponding document names in a safe place. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来保护工作簿和工作簿 windows，但不会指定密码保护的结构。The following code example uses the method to protect the structure of the workbook and workbook windows, but without specifying password protection. 然后，该示例提示用户通过使用取消保护工作簿方法。The example then prompts the user to unprotect the workbook by using the method. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. summary.span: 由 [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] 调用，以便可从工作簿移除密码保护，并能保存缓存数据。

span.span: Called by the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] so that you can remove password protection from the workbook and enable cached data to be saved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你的工作簿受密码保护，而且它包含的缓存的数据，可能在运行时更改 Excel 重写此方法在文档级项目中。Override this method in a document-level project for Excel if your workbook is protected by using a password, and it contains cached data that might be changed at run time. 在你实现此方法中，使用暂时取消保护工作簿的方法。In your implementation of this method, use the method to temporarily unprotect the workbook. 默认情况下，对受密码保护的工作簿中的缓存数据的更改不会保留在保存工作簿时。By default, changes to cached data in a password-protected workbook are not persisted when the workbook is saved. 若要将更改保存到缓存的数据，必须在你的项目中重写以下方法：To save changes to the cached data, you must override the following methods in your project: - 。. 保存工作簿后，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用此方法。When the workbook is saved, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls this method. 将代码添加到此方法的暂时取消保护该工作簿。Add code to this method that temporarily unprotects the workbook. 这使对缓存的数据要保存更改。This enables changes to the cached data to be saved. - 。. 保存工作簿后，[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]调用此方法。After the workbook is saved, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls this method. 将代码添加到此方法的重新应用到的工作簿的保护。Add code to this method that reapplies protection to the workbook. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Password-Protected 文档中缓存数据](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-cache-data-in-a-password-protected-document.md)。For more information, see [How to: Cache Data in a Password-Protected Document](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-cache-data-in-a-password-protected-document.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法暂时取消的工作簿保护，以便可以保存到缓存的数据的更改。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to temporarily unprotect the workbook so that changes to the cached data can be saved. 该示例首先将保存当前和值，以便可以更高版本中重新应用相同类型的保护方法。The example first saves the current and values, so that the same type of protection can be reapplied later in the method. 若要使用此代码，可以从运行`ThisWorkbook`Excel 的文档级项目中的类。To use this code, run it from the `ThisWorkbook` class in a document-level project for Excel. 该代码假定该密码存储在名为的字段中`securelyStoredPassword`。The code assumes that the password is stored in a field named `securelyStoredPassword`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用强密码合并大写和小写字母、 数字和符号。Use strong passwords that combine uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols. 弱密码不同时包含这些元素。Weak passwords do not mix these elements. 强密码： Y6dh ！ et5。Strong password: Y6dh!et5. 弱密码： House27。Weak password: House27. 使用你自己可以记住，以便无需将其记下的强密码。Use a strong password that you can remember so that you do not have to write it down. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UpdateFromFile() cil managed

summary.span: 如果磁盘版本比内存中加载的工作簿副本更新，则从保存的工作簿磁盘版本更新只读工作簿。

span.span: Updates a read-only workbook from the saved disk version of the workbook if the disk version is more recent than the copy of the workbook that is loaded in memory.

summary.span: 如果自加载工作簿以来还未更改过磁盘副本，则不重新加载工作簿的内存副本。

span.span: If the disk copy has not changed since the workbook was loaded, the in-memory copy of the workbook is not reloaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作簿是以只读方式打开由用户 A 和由用户 B.打开作为读/写时，此方法很有用如果用户 A 仍然具有工作簿打开，用户将无法获取更新的副本，而无需关闭和重新打开工作簿和丢失视图设置时，用户 B 将较新版本的工作簿保存到磁盘中。This method is useful when a workbook is opened as read-only by user A and opened as read/write by user B. If user B saves a newer version of the workbook to disk while user A still has the workbook open, user A cannot get the updated copy without closing and reopening the workbook and losing view settings. 方法更新内存中副本的磁盘文件中的工作簿。The method updates the in-memory copy of the workbook from the disk file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 第二个维度的第一个元素是用户的名称，则第二个元素将日期和时间用户上一次打开工作簿，第三个元素是一个数字，指示列表的类型 （1 表示独占的而 2 表示共享）。The first element of the second dimension is the name of the user, the second element is the date and time when the user last opened the workbook, and the third element is a number indicating the type of list (1 indicates exclusive, and 2 indicates shared). 此属性不返回有关了指定的工作簿以只读方式打开用户的信息。This property does not return information about users who have the specified workbook open as read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 未指定的值`Destination`参数，如果你想要将数据导入现有的映射。Do not specify a value for the `Destination` parameter if you want to import data into an existing mapping. 以下情况将导致此方法以生成运行时错误：The following conditions will cause this method to generate run-time errors: - 指定的 XML 数据包含语法错误。The specified XML data contains syntax errors. - 导入过程已取消，因为指定的数据无法容纳到工作表。The import process was cancelled because the specified data cannot fit into the worksheet. 使用方法以将 XML 数据文件导入到当前工作簿。Use the method to import an XML data file into the current workbook. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 XML 数据导入工作簿。The following code example demonstrates how to import XML data into a workbook. 该示例创建客户的名称，并将添加基于的 XML 架构到当前工作簿的集合。The example creates a of customer names and adds an based on the XML schema for the to the collection of the current workbook. 该示例然后调用方法将数据导入到工作表`Sheet1`。The example then calls the method to import the data into worksheet `Sheet1`. 当调用方法时，事件处理程序会提示用户继续还是取消导入 XML 中，与事件处理程序会报告是否已成功导入了 XML。When the method is called, the event handler prompts the user to either proceed with or cancel importing the XML, and the event handler reports whether the XML was successfully imported. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization.
